ValidationRule.description: An Expense Line's Project field value may not be updated once set (unless parent Expense Report is changed, Admin Global Edit is checked, Audit Notes are provided, and Actuals Calculation Mode is Scheduled).
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An Expense Line's Project field value may not be updated once set (unless parent Expense Report is changed, Admin Global Edit is checked, Audit Notes are provided, and Actuals Calculation Mode is Scheduled).
